member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en">
<head> <meta charset="UTF-8" /> <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> <title>Pure CSS Animated Progress Bar Example</title>
<meta name="author" content="Codeconvey" />
<!-- Progress bar CSS --> <style type="text/css"> .bg { background-color: #fff; width: 400px; height: 30px; mar [rest of string was truncated]";.
